DRMPlugin::IOpenIPMPMessenger

DRMPlugin::IOpenIPMPMessenger Class Reference

Class used by other managers for communication with openIPMP server. More...

#include <IOpenIPMPMessenger.h>

 Grant license to user for the content identifier.

Detailed Description

Class used by other managers for communication with openIPMP server.

Remarks:
All functions are thread-safe.

Definition at line 31 of file IOpenIPMPMessenger.h.

const std::string &  password,
const std::string &  hostIP,
const int  hostPort,
const std::string &  contentInfo,
std::string &  contentID
)  [pure virtual]
 

Assign content identifier.

Parameters:
userName input, user's name.
password input, user's password.
hostIP input, host's IP address.
hostPort input, host's port.
contentInfo input, basic content information.
contentID output, assigned content identifier.
Returns:
Boolean indicating success or failure.

Register content encryption key with respect to content identifier.

Parameters:

password input, user's password.
hostIP input, host's IP address.
hostPort input, host's port.
key input, encryption key.
keyLen input, encryption key length.
contentID input-output, content identifier, possibly updated in the process.
Returns:
Boolean indicating success or failure.

const int  endDay
)  [pure virtual]
 

Grant license to user for the content identifier.

Parameters:
userName input, granter's name.
password input, granter's password.
hostIP input, host's IP address.
hostPort input, host's port.
contentID input, content identifier.
grantee input, user to which the license is granted.
licenseType input, type of the license granted.
startYear input, start year for the license.
startMonth input, start month for the license.
startDay input, start day for the license.
endYear input, end year for the license.
endMonth input, end month for the license.
endDay input, end day for the license.
Returns:
Boolean indicating success or failure.
